title: Function Property Names
description: In this lab, we will explore how to use JavaScript to get an array of function property names from an object's own enumerable properties. We will learn how to iterate over an object's properties and use Object.keys() and Object.getPrototypeOf() to include inherited properties if needed. We will also filter out non-function properties using Array.prototype.filter().

meta.title: Mastering Function Property Names in JavaScript
meta.description: Explore how to use JavaScript to get an array of function property names from an object's own enumerable properties.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, functions, javascript lab, tutorial, javascript tutor, programming, object properties

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
